'也门', 'South Africa': '南非', 'Zambia': '赞比亚', 'Zimbabwe': '津巴布韦' } var gMapData = [{ name: 'Afghanistan', value: 100, latitude: 42.5, longitude: 1.5 }, { name: 'China', value: 100, latitude: 39.9110666857, longitude: 116.4136103013 }, { name: 'Armenia', value: 100, latitude: 40.0690990000, longitude: 45.0381890000 }, ]; option = { backgroundColor: '#fff', title: { text: '世界地图标注', subtext: '点击访问', sublink: 'http://www.baidu.com', left: 'center', top: 'top', textStyle: { color: '#e0e6ef' } }, tooltip: { trigger: 'item', formatter: function(params) { return params.name + '
' + params.value[0] + "," + params.value[1]; } }, geo: { type: 'map', map: 'world', roam: false, label: { emphasis: { show: false } }, itemStyle: { normal: { areaColor: '#e0e6ef', //区域颜色 borderColor: '#ffffff' //区域划分边框颜色 }, emphasis: { areaColor: '#e0e6ef' //鼠标Havor颜色 } } }, series: [{ type: 'effectScatter', coordinateSystem: 'geo', data: gMapData.map(function(itemOpt) { return { name: nameMap[itemOpt.name], value: [ itemOpt.longitude, itemOpt.latitude, itemOpt.value ], label: { normal: { show: true, position: 'top', formatter: '{b}', textStyle: { color: 'black', fontWeight: 'bold' } } }, symbolSize: 10, showEffectOn: 'render', rippleEffect: { brushType: 'stroke' }, hoverAnimation: true, itemStyle: { normal: { color: '#ff3300', shadowBlur: 10, shadowColor: 'black' } } }; }) }] };
